attributes.action: Remove heavy transport and delivery vehicles from our highways during the day and make these vehicles operate overnight.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having noticed the amount of traffic on the nations roads and the problems that this brings - a simple solution would be to remove our nations freight to work outside of certain times. For example there could be a policy to make freight transport opperate between the hours of 7pm until 7am.

This would remove heavy transport and delivery vehicles from our highways

I believe this would have the following effects:-

Reduction in fatal accidents due to collisions with heavy traffic.

Reduction in pollution at peak periods

Reduction in congestion by spreading traffic through out the 24 hour day.

Increase in employment (night shift for deliveries / increase of police etc).

Increase in national productivity to business (no lost hours sat in traffic)

Increase revenues from freight traffic (tax to police outside hours deliveries).
